page_title: CYBERSURE - Master's Programme in Cybersecurity and Assurance

content.text: Discover what makes CYBERSURE a world-class master's programme
Study at multiple European universities and experience diverse cybersecurity approaches across different countries and cultures.
Master advanced topics in cybersecurity, privacy, cryptography, and risk management taught by world-renowned experts.
Access internship opportunities and build networks with leading cybersecurity companies and research institutions.
Competitive scholarships covering tuition, travel, and living costs for talented students worldwide.
Conduct your master thesis with top-tier research groups working on cutting-edge cybersecurity challenges.
Choose your own path through our consortium universities across Norway, Finland, Sweden, Denmark, Estonia, France, and Austria.

content.title: Erasmus Mundus Quality Label
content.description: CYBERSURE is officially recognized by the European Commission as a programme of excellence, ensuring world-class education standards and prestigious joint degrees.
